select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select r.*,e.emp_name from rr r,emp e where r.emp_num=e.emp_num and r.rr_type between 0 and 1 order by r.rr_date desc) a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select r.*,e.emp_name from rr r,emp e where r.emp_num=e.emp_num and r.rr_type = #{rr_type} order by r.rr_date desc) a ) where rn between 1 and 3

select e.emp_name as emp_name, e.ph_path as ph_path, d.content as dcontent,t.content as tcontent,r.content as rcontent from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and emp_num = #{emp_num}
mapper.insert: insert into rr(emp_num, rr_num, rr_type, rr_subject, rr_content, rr_filename ,rr_date) values (#{emp_num}, rr_seq.nextval, #{rr_type}, #{rr_subject}, #{rr_content}, #{rr_filename}, sysdate)
insert into rr(emp_num, rr_num, rr_type, rr_subject, rr_content, rr_date) values (#{emp_num}, rr_seq.nextval, #{rr_type}, #{rr_subject}, #{rr_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update rr set rr_type=#{rr_type}, rr_subject=#{rr_subject}, rr_content=#{rr_content}, rr_filename=#{rr_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,rr_date=sysdate where rr_num = #{rr_num}
